items.quote: Project Annie gave my children a safe, loving place to learn while I finished my degree. I couldn't have done it without Ms. Annie.
items.author: Maria T.

items.quote: Volunteering at the Thanksgiving meal service changed my perspective. The sense of community here is unlike anything I've experienced.
items.author: James K.

items.quote: The dedication Ms. Annie shows to every child and family is inspiring. This organization is the heart of Frenchtown.
items.author: Dr. Sarah M.

items.quote: Volunteering at Project Annie was one of the most rewarding experiences of my college years. The children's smiles make every moment worthwhile.
items.author: Jessica M.

items.quote: The Thanksgiving meal event showed me what community really means. Hundreds of people coming together to feed their neighbors - it was incredible.
items.author: Marcus T.

items.quote: Knowing that every dollar goes directly to feeding families and caring for children makes giving easy. Project Annie is the real deal.
items.author: David R.
